thread.section_title: The Natural Sapphire Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Natural Sapphire Company | www.thenaturalsapphirecompany.com
thread.title: Jess Mc
thread.title_full: The Natural Sapphire Company reviewed by Jess Mc

author: Jess Mc
title: Jess Mc
text: I was a bit nervous at first, buying a sapphire online... from a complete stranger... on the other side of the world, but after contacting Mary I knew I was in safe hands. No question was ever a bother, she got back to me in a timely manner with all my requests and was easy to get in touch with. I wanted a Grey Sapphire, quite a rare size and cut, Mary persisted in finding the perfect stone for me, and succeeded. The payment process was simple and efficient and the returns policy put my mind at ease. My sapphire arrived on time as promised with all the correct documentation - its beautiful, I love it! Mary made the whole selection and buying process so easy - Thanks again Mary!
